short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Annotate Google Search Results with their respective ranks and customize badge colors.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SERP Rank Annotator allows you to quickly and easily see the position of organic results within Google SERPs. It's perfect for visually showing where you (or a competitor) appear within Google Organic results. It now also works on .co.uk and other popular gtlds.

You can also customise the colour with which the SERP is annotated.
